description: Next Door Exclusive, James Huntsman, is back for a solo jack off session.  James has an amazing physique you won't believe.  This time he's making a video for his girlfriend back home.  He's been away at school, working hard.  Not only will his girl be thrilled see this sensual private show, James is having fun making it.  Watch him pull his hard boner with a firm grip as he moves from the floor to the bed, shooting penetrating looks into the camera he has set up.  You'll be the first to see James's raw video, before he sends it to his special lady.  And look for a surprise guest, a college friend of James, who pops in to stroke with his pal.    Enjoy!
title: James Huntsman
